column4: can some one gimme a hand...all my web browsers are locking up on the same websites...
can some one gimme a hand...all my web browsers are locking up on the same websites...
sorry to interupt your discsiion can some one help me figure my lockup's plse
look can someone help or not?
can i have one sample site wich locks up yer system?
have you tried using any text based browsers e.g. links?
try that first.  wanna make sure network is fine.  one step at a time
when u mention server hangs, are u able to switch to virtual consoles?
since you've got 2 pcs, can you try enabling ssh/telnet on your machine and remote from ur laptop?
just to make sure, you've tried ctrl-alt-f1 when it hung rite?
let's try to see if we can get the error.  btw, what have you installed recently?
r u running amsn when u use any of the browsers?
